transcript: a guy said he'd been working on his business for six months I said how many hours a day he said four hours a day I said okay how much money you made he said not much and I was like okay well clearly your four hours is because how could you not make money I was like well how many people did you reach out to during those 4 hours he's like well none and I was like well then what did you do there's only three things you can do talk to people one1 you make content about or you run ads that's it not enough people know who you are which is why you don't get enough two customers or the people who buy from you aren't worth much because you can only grow a business by selling more people or making them worth more that is it
